p: Still from the Mesosphaerum genus, the triterpenes ursolic acid ( 78), 2 α-hydroxyursolic acid ( 86), maslinic acid ( 87), pomolic acid ( 88) and 2 α,3 α-dihydroxy oleanolic acid ( 89) were isolated from Mesosphaerum oblongifolium (Benth.) Kuntze (syn. Hyptis oblongifolia Benth.) ( Pereda-Miranda et al., 1990). From the aerial parts of Mesosphaerum urticoides (Kunth.) Harley & J.F.B.Pastore (syn. Hyptis urticoides Kunth.), ursolic acid ( 78) was isolated ( de Vivar et al., 1991).
